content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Condé Nast Traveller Reader’s Choice Awards 2022

 

Each year, prestigious international magazine Condé Nast Traveller encourages readers to rank their favourite destinations and travel companies in the Reader’s Choice Awards survey.

 

We invite you to take a few minutes to cast your vote and spread the word about our property. Click here to begin and share your experience. The Esplanade Zagreb is nominated in the following category: Hotels & Resorts. Voting for the 2022 Reader’s Choice Awards has already begun and is open now through June 30 2022.

 

We sincerely appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you again soon at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel.

 

Sincerely,
The Esplanade Team

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
